donateCrypto(uint256,string,string,strin.notice: donateCrypto: native ETH (Sepolia) to a specific request. Funds are held in ESCROW and released on verifyDelivery().

donateFiat(uint256,string,string,string,.notice: donateFiat (record only): backend/operator calls after confirming INR payment off-chain. amountPaise = INR * 100 (store integers).

donateGoods(uint256,string,string,string.notice: donateGoods: record in-kind goods donation. allocated=true immediately (as per your requirement).

helpRequestSubmit(string,string,string,u.notice: helpRequestSubmit: user creates a help request. Returns new requestId.

verifyDelivery(uint256).notice: verifyDelivery: backend/operator passes requestId + donationId (and checks donor off-chain). - marks donation delivered - marks request fulfilled (true) - if donation is MONEY_CRYPTO: releases that donation's escrow to requester's wallet
